mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REQ_NO) FROM REQUEST WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQUEST WHERE REQ_CATEGORY = #{category}
AND MEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND REQ_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND REQ_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND STATUS = 'Y'

FROM REQUEST WHERE REQ_CATEGORY = #{category}
AND MEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND REQ_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND REQ_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REQ_NO DESC

FROM (SELECT REQ_NO, REQ_PURPOSE, REQ_TITLE, REQ_CATEGORY, REQ_CONTENT, REQ_DATE, REQ_COUNT, MEM_ID, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT REQ_NO, REQ_PURPOSE, REQ_TITLE, REQ_CATEGORY, REQ_CONTENT, REQ_DATE, REQ_COUNT, MEM_ID FROM REQUEST WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REQ_NO DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startValue} AND #{endValue}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST ( REQ_NO, REQ_PURPOSE, REQ_TITLE, REQ_CATEGORY, REQ_CONTENT, REQ_DATE, REQ_COUNT, MEM_ID ) VALUES ( REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reqPurpose}, #{reqTitle}, #{reqCategory}, #{reqContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, #{memId} )

INSERT INTO IMG_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_DATE ) VALUES ( IMG_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardType}, REQUEST_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{imgFilePath}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST SET REQ_COUNT = REQ_COUNT + 1 WHERE REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
mapper.select: FROM IMG_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{reqNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = '의뢰'
mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
UPDATE REQUEST SET REQ_PURPOSE = #{reqPurpose}, REQ_CATEGORY = #{reqCategory}, REQ_TITLE = #{reqTitle}, REQ_CONTENT = #{reqContent} WHERE REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
UPDATE IMG_FILE SET ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName}, CHANGE_NAME = #{changeName}, FILE_PATH = #{imgFilePath} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo, REPLY_CONTENT replyContent, MEM_ID memId, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "replyDate" FROM REPLY WHERE REQ_NO = #{reqNo} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, MEM_ID, REQ_NO ) VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{memId}, #{reqNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT REQ.REQ_NO, REQ.REQ_PURPOSE, REQ.REQ_TITLE, REQ.REQ_CATEGORY, REQ.REQ_CONTENT, REQ.REQ_DATE, REQ.REQ_COUNT, REQ.MEM_ID, REP.REPLY_NO, REP.REPLY_CONTENT, REP.REPLY_DATE, REP.REQ_NO, REP.REPLY_DATE, REP.MEM_ID FROM REQUEST REQ LEFT JOIN REPLY REP ON REQ.REQ_NO = REP.REQ_NO WHERE REQ.REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
